name: Md. Shahriar Hossain
recommendation: Niaz Morshed is one of the best developers i have ever seen who much progressed in such a tenure age. I worked with him in a project where i found him dedicated, highly motivated and having on-time finish attitude. I believe he will a great asset for any company and wish him all the very best.

name: Samsul Haque Mohammad Sohel
description: Microsoft Certified Trainer | Azure Solution Expert | Cloud Specialist
recommendation: I had the pleasure of working with Niaz Morshed. He demonstrates a strong ability to develop and maintain high-quality, responsive user interfaces using React.js. He has a keen eye for design and is able to create visually appealing interfaces that are easy to navigate. I highly recommend him for any frontend development role that requires expertise in React.js.
